alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Dallas; Hale; Marengo; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Marengo, Perry, Hale, southwestern Bibb and southwestern Dallas Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Evansville to Uniontown to near Vredenburgh. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Greensboro, Uniontown, Moundville, Akron, Orrville, Newbern, Bogue Chitto, Vaiden, Central Mills, Heiberger, Dannelly Reservoir, Greensboro Municipal Airport, Low Gap, Mertz, Marion Junction, Evansville, Radford, Carleys and Safford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
